Class JMobileInfoResource

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.jalios.jcms.mashup.MashupConstants, com.jalios.jcms.rest.RestConstants
    public class JMobileInfoResource
extends com.jalios.jcms.rest.JcmsRestResource
    JMobile Plugin Info Rest resource. This resource is used in the pre-authentification phase of JMobile App.
